function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for unauthorized access to personal data via Bluetooth","Impact":"Unauthorized access to personal data, potential for data theft or privacy violation","Mitigation":"Regularly updating Bluetooth devices, using secure connections, and disabling unnecessary Bluetooth features","Technologies":"Bluetooth encryption protocols, secure pairing mechanisms, and regular security updates","People":"Users of Bluetooth-enabled devices","Owner":"Bluetooth manufacturers and technology developers"},{"Description":"Bluejacking and spam via Bluetooth","Impact":"Disturbance, panic, or annoyance for Bluetooth users, potential for dissemination of unwanted content","Mitigation":"Keeping Bluetooth devices non-discoverable in public places, ignoring unsolicited Bluetooth messages, and staying informed about Bluetooth security best practices","Technologies":"Bluetooth non-discoverable mode, user awareness and education, message filtering and blocking features","People":"Users of Bluetooth-enabled devices in public places","Owner":"Individual users and awareness campaigns"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns with Bluetooth contact tracing for COVID-19","Impact":"Potential breach of privacy, data misuse, or unauthorized tracking","Mitigation":"Transparency in data collection and storage, user consent for contact tracing, and adherence to privacy regulations and guidelines","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving Bluetooth protocols, user consent mechanisms, and data encryption","People":"General public, individuals participating in contact tracing","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, and technology developers"}]}
